long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A VPN extension that helps you mask your data, bypass geo-restricted content and surf the internet at robust speeds.

CircuitVPN is a comprehensive Virtual Private Network (VPN) with dedicated apps for desktop, mobile, and TV platforms, along with proxy extensions compatible with all major browsers.

The CircuitVPN proxy extension utilizes encrypted proxy, which is an unbeatable power combo of security and fast speeds. With our VPN proxy extension for Chrome, you can keep your information hidden from prying eyes while you’re browsing, access content from anywhere in the world, and stream movies and shows at blazing speeds, all in just 1-click.

Why do you need CircuitVPN’s VPN proxy extension for Chrome?

• Bypass geo-restricted content

If the constant disappointment of  ‘This content is not available in your country’ gets you down then definitely you require CircuitVPN’s Chrome extension to help you bypass those restrictions and enjoy content from anywhere in the world.

• Browse anonymously on the internet.
 It’s frustrating to know that internet service providers, authorities, website owners, and many different entities keep track of your data when you’re browsing the internet. If you’re someone who wants to browse the internet with complete anonymity, then CircuitVPN’s chrome extension has got you covered. 

• Get access to websites and social media. 

Do you surf social media or news on a daily basis? And although authorities restrict you from connecting with social media and news sites, CircutVPN’s Chrome extension is a seamless solution to assist you in bypassing those restrictions. 

• Encrypt internet traffic
Browsing the internet seamlessly with complete freedom and anonymity is a pleasure, but if you’re someone who prioritizes security over anything, then CircuitVPN’s chrome extension is just the right stop for you.

What features do CircuitVPN VPN proxy extension offer?

1 click, and that too at blazing-fast speeds.

• 85+ server Locations worldwide

CircuitVPN’s VPN Chrome extension offers more than 85+ locations for you to connect with. We Have a VPN for the US, UK, Australia, Canada, Singapore, Germany, India, and almost all other countries Servers. Feel free to connect to your desired country from the CircuitVPN proxy extension in just a single click.

• 6500+ optimized VPN servers 

Experience our optimized 6500+ server network, delivering robust VPN speeds across all countries. Simply select your desired location and let the VPN find the best server for you with just one click.

• Bypass Proxy

With CircuitVPN's Bypass Proxy feature, enjoy personalized browsing at your convenience. Surf securely using CircuitVPN's VPN Chrome extension, with the ability to selectively disable specific websites of your choice. Experience seamless browsing on your local network with CircuitVPN.

• WebRTC Leak Protection

WebRTC is the technology for real-time communication between browsers. WebRTC leaks the IP address of the end-user, when one attempts to establish a video or audio communication through a browser. The WebRTC Leak Protection feature at CircuitVPN puts an end to unnecessary IP address leaks and prevents websites from utilizing your data while you’re connected to our VPN Chrome extension.
 

• Proxy Network
Our Chrome extension utilizes a proxy server which serves as a gateway between the user and the internet. With our VPN proxy extension, bandwidth consumption is low, providing you with fast speeds to access content and encrypt your activities at the same time.

How to enable the VPN extension in Chrome?

Configuring a CircuitVPN VPN proxy extension is just so simple. Just follow these 4 steps stated below.

1. Add the CircuitVPN extension to your Chrome browser by clicking the ‘Add to Chrome’ button.

2. Get a CircuitVPN subscription.

3. Login to your CircuitVPN account.

4. Select your country, and you’re connected to a VPN.
